item.title: PMC VTE News
item.description: We are doing NAM/VTE stuff like crazy.

item.title: PMC VTE v0.4 released!
item.description: Vietnam: The Experience v0.4 has been released. This is the final VTE release for OFP. Check more details at the official page and forums.

item.title: PMC ArmA VTE final alpha released!
item.description: Vietnam: The Experience ArmA final alpha has been released. Check more details at the official page and forums.

item.title: VTE ArmA 2 preview has been released!
item.description: Vietnam: The Experience ArmA 2 preview has been released. This is the preview or demonstration version of Vietnam: The Experience for ArmA 2. It includes only few necessary items from the real full VTE. The goal of this preview is to give players a taste of things to come, when we will release the full version in the future. Please read more from our forum topic, thanks.

item.title: VTE 06-14-10 final ArmA version has been released!
item.description: Vietnam: The Experience 06-14-10 final ArmA version has been released. Includes many bug fixes, improvements, new vehicles, weapons etc.

item.title: VTE homepage was updated!
item.description: Vietnam: The Experience homepage was updated. Earlier it was just OFP page, really outdated, so now we splitted OFP, ArmA and ArmA 2 pages separate so it is much easier to check each games VTE version. Hope you enjoy!

item.title: VTE v1.2.1 ready for MP!
item.description: Vietnam: The Experience v1.2.1 for ArmA 2 is now ready for multiplayer. Check it out from Six-Updater or look download instructions from VTE forum.

item.title: VTE v1.3.9 released!
item.description: Vietnam: The Experience v1.3.9 for ArmA 2 has been released. Download link from VTE ArmA 2 home page.

item.title: VTE v1.3.10 released!
item.description: Vietnam: The Experience v1.3.10 for ArmA 2 has been released. Download link from VTE ArmA 2 home page.

item.title: Vietnam: The Experience v1.4 released!
item.description:
PMC has released Vietnam: The Experience v1.4 for ArmA 2!

The leading, most comprehensive and detailed Vietnam war modification.

Too many changes to list, check changelog for details.

More details from VTE homepage

Check it out from this topic at our forum and online manual from here. Enjoy.

item.title: Vietnam: The Experience 10-03-12 Multiplayer Video!
item.description:
PMC has released Vietnam: The Experience 10-03-12 Multiplayer video!

Check it out from youtube. Enjoy.
